SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic. Manages the players, decks, common objectives, visible cards, and game progress.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Constructs a Game object and initializes the game components.

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes the common objectives and visible cards at the beginning of the game.

    • newPlayer

      public void newPlayer(String nickname)
      Adds a new player to the game with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the new player.

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Retrieves the list of players in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of players.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      The current player.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Retrieves the board of the game.
      Returns:
      The board of the game.

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(Player player, StarterCard starterCard)
      Initializes the play area for the specified player and places the starter card. The starter card is placed based on the specified side chosen by the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the play area is initialized.
      starterCard - The starter card to be placed in the player's play area.

    • drawSecretObjectives

      public List<ObjectiveCard> drawSecretObjectives()
      Draws two secret objectives for the player. The player will choose one of these.
      Returns:
      A list containing two drawn secret objectives.

    • drawStarterCard

      public StarterCard drawStarterCard()
      Draws the starter card for the player.
      Returns:
      the drawn starter card

    • setPlayerSecretObjective

      public void setPlayerSecretObjective(Player player, ObjectiveCard secretObjective)
      Sets the secret objective for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose secret objective is being set.
      secretObjective - The secret objective card to set for the player.

    • getCommonObjectives

      public List<ObjectiveCard> getCommonObjectives()
      Retrieves the list of common objectives in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of common objectives.

    • getVisibleGoldCards

      public List<GoldCard> getVisibleGoldCards()
      Retrieves the list of the visible gold cards
      Returns:
      The list of the visible gold cards

    • getVisibleResourceCards

      public List<PlayableCard> getVisibleResourceCards()
      Retrieves the list of the visible resource cards
      Returns:
      The list of the visible resource cards

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Player player, PlayableCard playedCard, Coordinates coordinates) throws InvalidMoveException
      The played card is placed on the player's play area at the specified coordinates. It is then removed from the player's hand. Updates the player stock. The player's score is updated on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is playing the card.
      playedCard - The card being played.
      coordinates - The coordinates on the board where the card will be placed.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - If the move is not valid.

    • getResourceDeckPeek

      public PlayableCard getResourceDeckPeek()
      Retrieves the card on the peek of the resource card deck
      Returns:
      The card on the peek of the resource card deck

    • getGoldDeckPeek

      public GoldCard getGoldDeckPeek()
      Retrieves the card on the peek of the gold card deck
      Returns:
      The card on the peek of the resource deck

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, PlayableCard chosenCard) throws InvalidChoiceException
      Draws a card for the player and manages card replacement for visible and top deck cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who draws the card.
      chosenCard - The card chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - If the chosen card is invalid.

    • updateCurrentPlayer

      public void updateCurrentPlayer()
      Updates the current player to the next player in the list. If the current player is the last player in the list, the next player will be the first player in the list.

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Checks if it is the last turn of the game.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last turn, false otherwise.

    • winner

      public Player winner()
      Finds the winner of the game based on the player with the highest score.
      Returns:
      The player with the highest score. Returns null if there are no players or if the scores map is empty.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player player)
      Sets the current player to the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to set as the current player.

    • checkLastTurn

      public boolean checkLastTurn()
      Checks if it is the last turn of the game. The game is considered to be in the last turn if any of the following conditions are met: - A player has reached 20 points. - The gold deck is empty. - The resource deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last turn, false otherwise.

    • restorePlayersHands

      public void restorePlayersHands(Map<String,List<PlayableCard>> playersHands)
      When you upload an already started match this function is used to restore the hands of the players as they were when the match was interrupted

    • restorePlayersPlayAreas

      public void restorePlayersPlayAreas(Map<String,Card[][]> playersPlayAreas)
      When you upload an already started match this function is used to restore the play areas of the players as they were when the match was interrupted

    • getResourceDeck

      public Stack<PlayableCard> getResourceDeck()
      Retrieves the resource deck of the game
      Returns:
      The resource deck of the game

    • setResourceDeck

      public void setResourceDeck(ResourceDeck resourceDeck)
      Sets the resource deck
      Parameters:
      resourceDeck - The resource deck to set as the game resource deck

    • getGoldDeck

      public Stack<GoldCard> getGoldDeck()
      Retrieves the gold deck of the game
      Returns:
      The gold deck of the game

    • setGoldDeck

      public void setGoldDeck(GoldDeck goldDeck)
      Sets the gold deck
      Parameters:
      goldDeck - The gold deck to set as the game resource deck

    • setCommonObjectives

      public void setCommonObjectives(List<ObjectiveCard> objectiveCards)
      Sets the common objectives card
      Parameters:
      objectiveCards - The objective cards to set as the game common objective cards

    • setVisibleResourceCards

      public void setVisibleResourceCards(List<PlayableCard> visibleResourceCards)
      Sets the visible resource cards
      Parameters:
      visibleResourceCards - The visible resource cards to set as the game visible resource cards

    • setVisibleGoldCards

      public void setVisibleGoldCards(List<GoldCard> visibleGoldCards)

      Parameters:
      visibleGoldCards - The visible gold cards to set as the game visible gold cards
